# AI Daily Harvest

> Opinionated daily AI content feed. Algorithm-driven, personally curated.

Covers 40+ Chinese and English AI sources. Each article is scored (0-100) and assigned a verdict: must_read, worth_reading, neutral, noise, or overhyped.

## Endpoints

- daily/{date}.json: Full scored articles for a given date
- daily/{date}.md: Human-readable daily digest
- lists/daily-picks.json: Today's must-reads and noise (red/black list)

## Quick Start

Fetch today's must-reads:
  GET https://raw.githubusercontent.com/makinotes/ai-daily-harvest/master/lists/daily-picks.json

Fetch full data for a date:
  GET https://raw.githubusercontent.com/makinotes/ai-daily-harvest/master/data/2026-02-25.json

## Schema

See llms-full.txt for complete field definitions and usage guide.
